alert.note: Alert for Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Benton, western Washington, Delaware, southeastern Ottawa, Adair and east central Muskogee Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong showers along with isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Fairland to Oaks to near Gore. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Siloam Springs... Miami... Stilwell... Jay... Grove... Gentry... Gravette... Lincoln... Decatur... Westville... Fairland... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Bernice... Wyandotte... Watts... Oaks... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 298 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
